titles.title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 44) making further continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2011, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 44) making further continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2011, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 112-19, by Mr. Woodall.
All points of order against consideration of the joint resolution are waived.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 11.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 115.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 241 - 179 (Roll no. 151).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 251 - 170 (Roll no. 152).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 44) making further continuing appropriations for fiscal year 2011.
